item.description: Cheung Kong meeting Structure of group Outlook for real estate market and comparison to press cycle Presales legislation and easing impact on business What is an ideal sandbank size given unattractive price outlook? How to interpret falling consents to commence work ? A reflection of developer confidence in outlook for market or some other reason? Net cash position ? i.e.Â acquisitions made over past year? Hang Lung meeting Capital expenditure projection Funding for sites recently acquired how?
